Fera Incorporated is a private company specialized in delivering digital transformation solutions.

Kudla app is an idea borne out of a Mangalorean's need to quickly reach out to right contacts for daily use with no hassle.This app allows businesses to freely publish their contact details. And the Buy/Sell feature allows app users to buy items and publish the sale of used items. The Sell screen is a simple feature allowing users to publish the sale of items from a single screen with simple steps requiring not more than 2 to 5 minutes.

We would always want to hear from you on the features you look forward to be supported by this app.Feel free to send your thoughts or say casual Hi at kudlaapp@gmail.com :)
